alert.note: Alert for Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 20 at 11:31PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Custer County through MIDNIGHT MDT... At 1131 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over eastern Custer State Park, or 8 miles east of Custer, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... State Game Lodge around 1140 PM MDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fairburn. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 100 AM MDT for west central South Dakota.

area.areaDesc: Hermosa Foot Hills; Southern Black Hills
